welcome.title: Send, Receive & Manage your {protocol} tokens
welcome.body: Firefly is the official wallet software for {protocol}.

legal.title: Privacy Policy & Terms of Service
legal.body: Please review the Privacy Policy and Terms of Service.
legal.checkbox: I've read and I accept the Privacy Policy and Terms of Service

chooseProtocol.title: Choose protocol
chooseProtocol.body: Set the protocol for your profile.

chooseNetwork.title: Choose network
chooseNetwork.body: Set the network for your profile.

private-net.title: Private net
private-net.body: Support for custom networks with active TIPs

private-net.title: Private net
private-net.body: Support for custom networks with draft TIPs

setupPrivateNetworkConnection.title: Connect to a private network
setupPrivateNetworkConnection.body: Fill the form with the node information and connect to a private network.

setup.title: Set up {protocol, select, IOTA {an} Shimmer {a}} {protocol} profile

setupNew.title: Create a profile
setupNew.body: You can choose a regular software wallet, or if you have a Ledger device, you can set up a hardware wallet.

softwareAccount.title: Create a software profile
softwareAccount.description: Provides a Stronghold file and recovery phrase

ledgerAccount.title: Create a hardware profile
ledgerAccount.description: Ledger Nano S or Nano X required

setupRecovered.title: Recover {protocol} profile
setupRecovered.body: If you have an existing mnemonic or Stronghold backup file, you can import it here.
setupRecovered.importLedgerDescription: Restore from your Ledger Nano S or X device

setupClaimed.title: Claim Shimmer staking rewards
setupClaimed.body: Import your IOTA profile and claim your Shimmer staking rewards.

enterName.title: Create your {protocol} profile
enterName.body1: You can create multiple user profiles to organise your wallets and improve privacy.

body2.first: For now, let's start with your first profile name.
body2.nonFirst: For now, let's start with your profile name.

enterName.addMore: You can add more profiles later.

setupStrongholdPassword.title: Create a password
setupStrongholdPassword.body1: You need a strong password to protect your funds. Use a combination of words, and avoid common phrases, names or dates.
setupStrongholdPassword.body2: It is recommended that you write down your password in your Recovery Kit.

setupPinProtection.title: Set up PIN code
setupPinProtection.body1: Enter a 6-digit PIN below. You will be asked for your PIN to access your profile.

backupMnemonic.title: Back up your recovery phrase
backupMnemonic.body1: You will now be shown a recovery phrase. Write it down in your Recovery Kit.
backupMnemonic.body2: Do not share your recovery phrase with anyone. It can be used to access your tokens from anywhere.
backupMnemonic.body3: If you lose your recovery phrase, you may lose your funds.

viewMnemonic.title: Recovery phrase
viewMnemonic.body1: In your Recovery Kit, write down the words in the exact order shown.
viewMnemonic.body2: Keep this private and safely stored.
viewMnemonic.body3: It is important to have a written backup. Computers often fail and files can corrupt.

verifyMnemonic.title: Verify recovery phrase
verifyMnemonic.body: Let's check you wrote down the phrase correctly. Please select each word in numbered order. Tip: You can press the number next to the word in your keyboard to select it.
verifyMnemonic.verifiedBody: Remember to keep it private and safely stored.

backupStronghold.title: Back up to a Stronghold file
backupStronghold.body1: Enter your password to create a Stronghold backup of your profile. Your password is used to encrypt the backup file.
backupStronghold.body2: Reasons why digital backups are important:
backupStronghold.reason1: Easily recover your wallets without typing in your recovery phrase
backupStronghold.reason2: Import your wallets on other devices

importMnemonicPhrase.title: Enter your recovery phrase
importMnemonicPhrase.body: A recovery phrase is 24 words long, all lower case, with sapces between. This is used to recover existing Firefly profiles.

importStrongholdBackup.title: Import your Stronghold backup
importStrongholdBackup.body: Import a Stronghold backup file to restore your profile.

backupPassword.body2: This is the password you set when you first created your backup.

success.title: You have successfully recovered your backup
success.body: You can now set up your new profile.

claimRewards.title: Your Shimmer staking rewards
claimRewards.body: Please check that your Shimmer staking rewards are correct. If not, please use the balance finder.

success.title: Rewards claimed
success.body: You have successfully claimed Shimmer tokens for your new profile.

congratulations.title: Profile setup complete
congratulations.body: Your new profile is ready to use.
congratulations.softwareMigratedBody: You have successfully migrated your funds to the new network
congratulations.fireflyLedgerBody: Your Ledger account is successfully recovered and you can now continue.
congratulations.trinityLedgerBody: You have successfully migrated your Ledger to the new network.
congratulations.exportMigration: Export migration log and finish setup

ledgerInstallationGuide.title: Het jy die nodige Ledger app geïnstalleer?
ledgerInstallationGuide.body1: Before you proceed, you must use Ledger Live to find and install the {protocol} app.
ledgerInstallationGuide.body2: Maak seker dat jou Ledger firmware op datum is. Alle vooraf geïnstalleerde programme moet opgedateer word na hul nuutste weergawes.
ledgerInstallationGuide.action: Ja, ek het hierdie programme geïnstalleer

importFromLedger.title: Herstel of migreer jou Ledger
importFromLedger.body: Herstel jou bestaande Firefly Ledger-profiel, of migreer jou fondse vanaf Trinity.

connectLedger.title: Koppel jou Ledger aan Firefly
connectLedger.body: Om jou Ledger deur Firefly te vind, moet jy seker maak dat die amptelike Ledger Live program gesluit is.
connectLedger.unlock: Unlock your Ledger with its pin
connectLedger.openApp: Open the Shimmer app on your Ledger
connectLedger.tips: Wenke as jou Ledger nie verbind nie

restoreFromFireflyLedger.title: Herstel jou Ledger profiel
restoreFromFireflyLedger.body: Druk herstel om die opstelproses te voltooi en jou beursies, saldo's en transaksiegeskiedenis te herstel.

legacyLedgerIntro.title: Begin jou Ledger migrasie met Firefly
legacyLedgerIntro.body1: Firefly sal jou help om jou tokens na die nuwe Chrysalis netwerk oor te dra.
legacyLedgerIntro.body2: Na die migrasie kan jy jou tokens stuur en ontvang met jou Ledger in Firefly.
legacyLedgerIntro.readMore: Wat om te verwag van die migrasieproses

generateNewLedgerAddress.title: Genereer nuwe adres
generateNewLedgerAddress.body: Jy moet jou nuwe adres genereer om jou tokens met Firefly te migreer. Klik op die knoppie hieronder om voort te gaan.
generateNewLedgerAddress.confirmBody: Ter wille van veiligheid, vergelyk asseblief die adres wat op jou Ledger gegenereer is, met die adres hieronder. As hulle ooreenstem, druk albei knoppies op jou Ledger soos gevra.
generateNewLedgerAddress.confirmedBody: Jy het bevestig dat die adres in Firefly ooreenstem met die adres op jou Ledger.

switchLedgerApps.title: Skakel Ledger programme oor
switchLedgerApps.body: Skakel asseblief oor na die {legacy} app op jou Ledger om voort te gaan met migrasie. Wanneer gereed, druk voort.

selectLedgerAccountIndex.title: Kies Ledger rekeningindeks
selectLedgerAccountIndex.body: Kies die Ledger rekeningindeks wat jy saam met Trinity gebruik het. Vir die meeste gebruikers is dit die standaardindeks van 0.
selectLedgerAccountIndex.reinstallLegacy: Indien nie, ontkoppel die toestel en probeer weer. As die probleem voortduur, moet jy die {legacy} program weer installeer.

general.title: General
general.description: Configure your app's appearance and other general settings

security.title: Sekuriteit
security.description: Verander kou wagwoord en pas die veiligheidsverwante instellings aan

advanced.title: Advanced
advanced.description: Tools and manual settings for technical users

helpAndInfo.title: Help & Inligting
helpAndInfo.description: Vind die antwoord op 'n vraag of kry hulp met 'n probleem

profile.title: Profiel
profile.description: Verander jou profielnaam of stel 'n avatar in

theme.title: Tema
theme.advice: As jy jou stelseltema verander, moet jy dalk Firefly herbegin om die effekte te sien

currency.title: Geldeenheid
currency.description: Pas balansomskakeling aan en verander grafiekopsies

networkStatus.title: Netwerk status
networkStatus.description: Vertoon die status van die nodes waaraan jy tans gekoppel is

exportStronghold.title: Voer back-up uit
exportStronghold.description: Uitvoer na 'n Stronghold lêer - 'n volledige geïnkripteer back-up van jou beursies en die nuutste transaksiegeskiedenis

appLock.title: Sluit outomaties
appLock.description: Onaktiwiteitstyd voordat jou beursies sluit en jou uitgeteken

changePassword.title: Verander wagwoord
changePassword.description: Jou wagwoord word gebruik om jou beursies te beveilig. Jy moet 'n sterk wagwoord gebruik om jou fondse te beskerm

changePincode.title: Verander PIN-kode
changePincode.description: Jou PIN hou jou balans en transaksies privaat

changeProfileName.title: Verander profiel naam
changeProfileName.success: Jy het jou profiel naam verander

walletFinder.title: Wallet finder
walletFinder.description: Perform an extended search of your previously used wallets

hiddenAccounts.title: Steek beursie weg
hiddenAccounts.description: As jy hierdie opsies kies, word rekeninge wat voorheen weggesteek was, vertoon

deleteProfile.title: Vee profiel uit
deleteProfile.description: Verwyder jou hele profiel, beursie en transaksiegeskiedenis. Maak seker dat jy 'n back-up het

deepLinks.title: Deep links
deepLinks.description: Automatically fill transaction data in Firefly upon clicking a deep link starting with {appProtocol}://

description.dev: Jou netwerkinstellings sal outomaties opgedateer word volgens die huidige noduskonfigurasie (om van netwerke om te skakel sal lei tot die terugstelling van die beursiestatus)
description.nonDev: Jou netwerkinstellings sal outomaties opgedateer word volgens die huidige noduskonfigurasie

nodeConfiguration.title: Node keuse
nodeConfiguration.description: Kies "Manual" om nodusinstellings op te stel en aan jou eie node(s) te koppel

configureNodeList.title: Node konfigurasie
configureNodeList.description: Bestuur die lys van nodes waaraan jy kan koppel
configureNodeList.noNodes: Daar is geen nodes nie, kan nie aan die netwerk koppel nie
configureNodeList.noNodesAuto: Daar is geen nodes nie, outomatiese seleksie sal eerder gebruik word

proofOfWork.title: Proof of work
proofOfWork.description: Voltooi proof of work op jou toestel of uitvoer dit na 'n node

errorLog.title: Foutlêer
errorLog.description: Kyk na foute om 'n probleem op te spoor

crashReporting.title: Fout verslag
crashReporting.body: Help die ontwikkelaars om Firefly te verbeter deur outomaties diagnostiese data te stuur wanneer 'n fout of ongeluk plaasvind
crashReporting.advice: Herbegin asseblief die Firefly-toepassing na {sendCrashReports, select, true {start sharing crash reports} false {stop sharing crash reports} other {apply this change}}

troubleshoot.title: Probleemoplossing
troubleshoot.description: Gebruik die wizard vir probleemoplossing om algemene probleme op te los

documentation.title: Dokumentasie
documentation.description: Kyk na die dokumentasie vir diepgaande verduidelikings van hoe dinge werk

faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: Kyk na die algemene vrae om hulp te kry met algemene probleme of vrae

discord.title: Discord
discord.description: Kry hulp van die IOTA-gemeenskap op Discord

reportAnIssue.title: Rapporteer 'n probleem
reportAnIssue.description: Rapporteer 'n fout by die ontwikkelaars. Kyk eers om seker te maak dat dit nog nie gerapporteer is nie

login.pleaseWait: Wag asseblief {time, plural, one {# sekonde} other {# sekondes}}
login.incorrectAttempts: {attempts, plural, one {# verkeerde poging} other {# verkeerde pogings}}

statuses.appNotOpen: Ledger unlocked but app not open

status.upcoming: Staking geleentheid het nog nie begin nie

bodies.upcoming: Sit jou {token} tokens in om outomaties elke 10 sekondes belonings te ontvang sodra die inzet op {date} begin.
bodies.commencing: Stake jou {token} tokens in om outomaties elke 10 sekondes belonings te ontvang sodra die staking op {date} begin.
bodies.holdingAndStaking: Jy ontvang outomaties belonings elke 10 sekondes.
bodies.holdingAndNotStaking: Stake jou {token} tokens in om elke 10 sekondes belonings te ontvang.
bodies.endedAndDidStake: {token} belonings sal na jou beursie versprei word sodra die netwerk begin.
bodies.endedAndDidNotStake: You did not participate in this airdrop.
bodies.endedAndDidNotReachMinRewards: Jy het nie genoeg {token} tokens om die minimum belonings te bereik nie.
bodies.inactive: Maak netwerkkonfigurasie in gevorderde instellings oop en maak seker dat die huidige node die "Participation"-funksie het deur op "Bekyk inligting" te klik.

assembly.name: Assembly
assembly.description: Assembly is a permissionless, highly scalable multi-chain network to build and deploy composable smart contracts. Assembly is the future of web3.

shimmer.name: Shimmer
shimmer.description: Die aangespoorde verhoognetwerk om groot innovasies op IOTA te bevorder. Wat ook al gebeur, gebeur. Hoe Shimmer ontwikkel, is aan jou.

enableLedgerBlindSigning.title: Enable Blind Signing
enableLedgerBlindSigning.info: In order to confirm this transaction you need to enable Blind Signing on your ledger device.
enableLedgerBlindSigning.step_1: Connect and unlock your Ledger Device
enableLedgerBlindSigning.step_3: Press the right button to navigate to Settings. Then press both buttons to validate. Your Ledger device displays Blind Signing.
enableLedgerBlindSigning.step_4: Press both buttons to enable transaction blind signing. The device displays Enabled. You're done.

pendingTransactions.title: Locked in pending transactions
pendingTransactions.subtitle: For sending native assets and small IOTA amounts

password.title: Wagwoord benodig
password.subtitle: Please provide your password to unlock your wallets
password.backup: Voer asseblief you wagwoord in om you back-up export

version.title: Huidige weergawe: {version}
version.upToDateDescription: Jy gebruik die nuutste en veiligste weergawe van Firefly.
version.noAutoUpdate: Outo-opdatering is in hierdie Windows-weergawe gedeaktiveer. Gaan na https://firefly.iota.org om die opdatering af te laai.
version.preReleaseDescription: Jy gebruik 'n voorvrystelling weergawe van Firefly. Opdaterings is gedeaktiveer.

backupStronghold.title: Backup your stronghold file
backupStronghold.body: It is important to back up your wallet regularly to ensure you have a copy of your wallets and transaction history. If you lose your backup and recovery phrase you will lose access to your funds.

deleteAccount.title: Vee {name} uit?
deleteAccount.body: Hierdie beursie het geen transaksiegeskiedenis nie. Dit kan veilig verwyder word.
deleteAccount.typePassword: Voer die wagwoord van jou beursie in om te bevestig.
deleteAccount.errorBody1: Jy kan nie hierdie beursie verwyder nie, jy moet ten minste een hê.

hideAccount.title: Versteek {name}?
hideAccount.body: Jy kan hierdie beursie later vind deur "Wys versteekte beursies" aan te skakel in Gevorderde Instellings.
hideAccount.typePassword: Voer die wagwoord van jou beursie in om te bevestig.
hideAccount.errorBody1: Om 'n beursie te versteek, moet jy 0 balans hê.
hideAccount.errorBody2: Jy het tans {balance} op hierdie beursie oor. Skuif hierdie fondse na 'n ander beursie en probeer weer.
hideAccount.errorBody3: Jy kan nie hierdie beursie versteek nie, jy moet ten minste een hê.

excludeNode.title: Exclude node
excludeNode.body: Are you sure you want to exclude {url} from the available node pool?

unsetAsPrimaryNode.title: Clear primary node
unsetAsPrimaryNode.body: Are you sure you want to clear {url} as the primary node?

node.removeConfirmation: Is jy seker dat ujy hierdie node wil verwyder?

switchNetwork.title: Skakel netwerk oor
switchNetwork.resetWarning: Verandering van netwerke sal jou afmeld en alle rekeninge, balanse en transaksiegeskiedenis vir hierdie profiel terugstel.
switchNetwork.typePassword: Tik in you wagwoord om oor te skakel na:

deleteProfile.title: Vee profiel uit
deleteProfile.confirmation: Is jy seker jy wil hierdie profiel uitvee? Hierdie bewerking kan nie ontdoen word nie.
deleteProfile.typePassword: Tik in you wagwoord om te bevestig.

transaction.title: Bevestig die transaksie
transaction.body: Jy is op die punt om {amount} na
transaction.sendingFromStakedAccount: Jy stuur 'n oordrag vanaf 'n beursie wat tans in Staking is. Dit kan jou tokens unstake. Stuur gerus die oordrag, maar jy sal dalk jou oorblywende tokens daarna moet weer stake.
transaction.sendingFromStakedAccountBelowMinReward: Jy stuur 'n oordrag vanaf 'n beursie wat nog nie die minimum staking belonings bereik het nie. Dit kan jou tokens unstake en jy kan jou staking belonings op hierdie beursie verloor.

walletFinder.title: Wallet finder
walletFinder.body: Perform a more exhaustive search of addresses to find missing balances and wallets.
walletFinder.searchAgainHint: Is your balance or number of wallets incorrect? Search again until your full balance is shown.

riskFunds.title: Waarskuwing: fondse in gevaar tydens migrasie
riskFunds.body1: Dit word sterk aanbeveel dat jy al jou fondse beveilig voordat jy verder gaan met migrasie. Jou fondse is in gevaar as jy dit nie beveilig nie.
riskFunds.body2: Dit word aanbeveel dat jy die proses herhaal vir adresse met 'n medium risikovlak of hoër.

missingBundle.title: Warning: funds at risk during migration
missingBundle.body: Jy het geld op spandeerde adresse, maar die nodige inligting is nie gevind om dit te beveilig nie. Dit kan gebeur as jy lank gelede transaksies gedoen het. Jy kan voortgaan, maar {value} loop 'n risiko tydens migrasie.
missingBundle.learnMore: Kom meer te wete oor spandeerde adresse

snapshot.title: Deurlopende netwerkopgradering
snapshot.body: Die opgradering van die Chrysalis-netwerk het begin.
snapshot.bodyMigration: Migrasie is uitgeskakel totdat dit voltooi is.
snapshot.bodyFirefly: Firefly is uitgeskakel totdat dit voltooi is. Token migrasie sal daarna steeds moontlik wees.

ledgerNotConnected.title: Connect your Ledger
ledgerNotConnected.notConnected: Connect your Ledger device to continue.
ledgerNotConnected.locked: Unlock your Ledger device to continue.
ledgerNotConnected.appNotOpen: Open the {protocol} app on your Ledger device to continue.

ledgerConfirmation.confirm: Bevestig die aanwysing wat op jou Ledger toestel verskyn om voort te gaan

ledgerAppGuide.title: Gids vir die installering van die Ledger app

steps.0: Installeer en maak die Ledger Live app oop
steps.1: Maak seker dat jy die Ledger gekoppel het
steps.4: Onthou dat dit is belangrik om Ledger Live te sluit voordat jy na Firefly terugkeer

ledgerConnectionGuide.title: Tips if your Ledger isn’t connecting

steps.0: Maak seker dat Ledger Live nie op jou rekenaar oop is nie
steps.1: Maak seker dat jy jou Ledger toestel met you PIN ontsluit het
steps.2: Maak die nuwe IOTA app oop op jou Ledger

ledgerTransaction.title: Verify transaction
ledgerTransaction.info: Compare and confirm the transaction information displayed on your ledger device against the information below.

ledgerAddress.title: Bevestig die ontvang adres
ledgerAddress.body: Bevestig dat die ontvangsadres wat op jou Ledger verskyn, ooreenstem met die onderstaande. As hulle ooreenstem, druk op beide knoppies op jou Ledger soos aangedui.

ledgerMigrateIndex.title: Moet jy 'n ander Trinity rekeningindeks migreer?
ledgerMigrateIndex.body: Jy kan ook later in Gevorderde instellings migreer.

exportTransactionHistory.title: Voer transaksiegeskiedenis uit
exportTransactionHistory.body: Voer die transaksiegeskiedenis vir die geselekteerde beursie uit. Die uitgevoerde lêer sal in .csv-formaat wees.
exportTransactionHistory.typePassword: Tik jou wagwoord om uitvoer toe te laat

stakingManager.title: Staking Management
stakingManager.description: Wanneer jy 'n beursie stake, stuur jy 'n transaksie aan jouself en merk daardie fondse as "staked". Jy kan die tokens enige tyd oordra, maar jy sal nie aanhou om staking belonings te ontvang nie.
stakingManager.singleAccountHint: Looking for your wallets? Firefly has changed. Toggle between your wallets in the top menu bar.

stakingConfirmation.title: Confirm Participation
stakingConfirmation.subtitleStake: Jy is op die punt om te Stake
stakingConfirmation.subtitleMerge: Jy is op die punt om te kombineer
stakingConfirmation.multiAirdropWarning: If you do not want to participate in both airdrops, you can opt-out below. You can unstake and restake to opt back in at any time.
stakingConfirmation.mergeStakeWarning: Your funds will be staked for {airdrop}. To change which airdrops you want to participate in, unstake this wallet and stake it again.

newStakingPeriodNotification.title: Staking phase {periodNumber} from {date}
newStakingPeriodNotification.body: IOTA staking for Assembly continues... Participate in phase {periodNumber} for 90 days. Stake your IOTA tokens and earn ASMB rewards!
newStakingPeriodNotification.info: Shimmer staking is now complete and only ASMB tokens will be distributed.

shimmer-info.title: Oor Shimmer
shimmer-info.body1: Baie geluk, jy het SMR-tokens verdien as 'n Staking beloning. Shimmer is 'n aangespoorde staking netwerk om groot opgraderings op IOTA te toets.
shimmer-info.body2: Ons beoog om Shimmer in 2022 bekend te stel. Jou tokens sal beskikbaar wees om oor te dra sodra die netwerk begin.

assembly-info.title: Oor Assembly
assembly-info.body1: Baie geluk, jy het ASMB-tokens verdien as 'n staking beloning. Assembly is 'n multi-chain netwerk vir die implementering van skaalbare smart-contracts op IOTA.
assembly-info.body2: Ons beoog om Assembly in 2022 bekend te stel. Jou tokens sal beskikbaar wees om oor te dra sodra die netwerk begin.

confirmDeveloperProfile.title: Jy skep 'n ontwikkelaarprofiel
confirmDeveloperProfile.body: Jy sal by die Chrysalis Deevnet gekoppel wees, en kan handmatig van netwerke wissel. Gaan net voort as jy weet wat jy doen.

crashReporting.title: Crash reporting
crashReporting.body: Help the developers improve Firefly by automatically sending diagnostic data when an error or crash occurs. If selected, this will take effect after restarting Firefly.
crashReporting.checkbox: Send crash reports to the IOTA Foundation

legalUpdate.tosAndPrivPolicyBody: We have updated Firefly's Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
legalUpdate.tosBody: We have updated Firefly's Terms of Service.
legalUpdate.privPolicyBody: We have updated Firefly's Privacy Policy.
legalUpdate.tosAndPrivPolicyCheckbox: I've read and I accept the updated Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
legalUpdate.tosCheckbox: I've read and I accept the updated Terms of Service
legalUpdate.privPolicyCheckbox: I've read and I accept the updated Privacy Policy

singleAccountGuide.title: The way you use Firefly has changed
singleAccountGuide.body: The content of each tab is now in the context of a single wallet. You can change the selected wallet from anywhere by using the switcher in the title bar.
singleAccountGuide.hint: Can't find a wallet? Use the balance finder in the settings to discover previously used wallets.

tokenInformation.verificationWarning: This token is unverified. Compare the token metadata against the relevant team’s official website. Only verify tokens that you trust.

faucetRequest.title: Faucet request
faucetRequest.body: Are you sure you want to request {token} tokens from the {network} faucet?

confirmRejection.title: Reject transaction
confirmRejection.description: Are you sure you want to reject this transaction?
confirmRejection.node: Please note that rejecting a transaction only hides it from your Activity feed

restoreWalletDescription.iota: Migrate to Chrysalis or restore an existing wallet

actions.createWalletDescription: Create a fresh profile running on {protocol, select, iota {Chrysalis} shimmer {Shimmer}}
actions.claimShimmerDescription: Migrate IOTA profile and claim staking rewards

general.noAccounts: Jy het geen beursies nie, skep asseblief een.
general.firstSync: Gesinkroniseer geskiedenis, dit kan 'n rukkie neem...
general.creatingProfile: Skep tans profiel op, wag asseblief...
general.accountRemoved: Hierdie beursie is versteek. Wys dit om oordragte uit te kan voer.
general.mintNativeTokenDescription: Mint native token following IRC30 standard
general.refreshTokenMetadataDescription: Reset and refresh all token metadata
general.refreshTokenMetadataHint: This will reset all your tokens' metadata including the verification status and unhide any hidden assets.
general.testDeepLinkDescription: Simulate a deep link request sent to firefly

dates.daysAgo: {time, plural, one {# dag} other {# dae}} terug
dates.weeksAgo: {time, plural, one {# week} other {# weke}} terug
dates.monthsAgo: {time, plural, one {# maand} other {# maande}} terug
dates.yearsAgo: {time, plural, one {# jaar} other {# jare}} terug

notifications.confirmedInternalNoAccounts: Die interne oordrag van {{value}} is bevestig
notifications.failed: Uitgaande {{value}} vanaf {{account}} het nie oordra nie
notifications.downloadingUpdate: Besig om bywerking af te laai
notifications.updateError: 'N Fout het tydens die opdatering voorgekom. Probeer asseblief weer
notifications.minutesRemaining: {minutes, plural, one {# minuut oor} other {# minute oor}}
notifications.fundsAvailableSoon: Jou fondse sal binnekort beskikbaar wees

exportTransactionHistory.success: Transaksiegeskiedenis vir {accountAlias} is suksesvol gestoor na {filePath}
exportTransactionHistory.error: Kan nie transaksiegeskiedenis vir {accountAlias} uitvoer nie

deepLinkingRequest.receivedWhileLoggedOut: Please login to initiate the deep link
deepLinkingRequest.invalidFormat: The deep link you followed is invalid
deepLinkingRequest.invalidNumber: The amount in deep link is not a number {amount}

send.success: Payment details added from deep link

notifications.syncing: Please wait until synchronization is finished to change wallets.
notifications.transferring: Please wait until all transactions are completed to change wallets.
notifications.participating: Please wait until all staking/voting transactions are completed to change wallets.

faucetRequest.success: Request for tokens sent to the faucet

refreshTokenMetadata.success: All token metadata has been reset and refreshed

restoreFromStrongholdBackup.wrongProtocol: Protocol doesn't match coin type found in Stronghold backup
restoreFromStrongholdBackup.wrongProtocolForClaiming: You must use an IOTA-based Stronghold backup to claim Shimmer rewards

findShimmerRewards.error: An error occurred while searching for rewards

claimShimmerRewards.error: An error occurred while claiming rewards

profile.duplicate: Daar bestaan ​​reeds 'n profiel met hierdie naam.
